Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
Hsm SOAP Command

Starts the HSM process, which moves blobs for older messages to the current secondary message volume. This request is asynchronous. The progress of the last HSM process can be monitored with GetHsmStatusRequest. The HSM policy is read from the zimbraHsmPolicy LDAP attribute.

Network edition only API TRUE
Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

    <HsmRequest /> ## HsmRequest

HsmResponse

    <HsmResponse /> ## HsmResponse
